pages.text: All $(aoa) $(thing)skills$() come with a list of unlockable $(thing)abilities$() that give various bonuses and effects as you level up.$(br)Each $(thing)skill$() has different available $(thing)abilities$() at different levels.
pages.title: Skill Abilities

pages.text: Every individual $(thing)ability$() can be disabled and re-enabled in the $(l:aoa3:advent_gui_base#advent_gui)Advent GUI$(/l), so if you don't like a particular ability or just don't want to use it for a while, you can toggle it off.
